Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerStatusListener
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerStatusListener

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Match match
    The match managed by the controller
    private java.util.List<PlayerController> players
    A list containing the PlayerControllers of the players of the match
    private StatusObserver gameStatusObserver
    An observer that catches all modifies to the match
    protected boolean suspended
    True if the match has been suspended by the players

    • handleReceivedGameMessage

      public void handleReceivedGameMessage​(Message message, java.lang.String username)
      Method that map a message and an username with the the action that must be executed
      Parameters:
      message - the message received from the client via socket
      username - the username of the user that sent the message

    • showPlayerLeaderBoard

      private void showPlayerLeaderBoard​(java.lang.String username, Message message)
      Sends to the player whose message is being handled the PlayerBoard requested
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the player who sent the request
      message - the message containing the data

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the match ending the phase of adding players. The firt player is chosen randomly.

    • leaderCardsChoice

      public void leaderCardsChoice​(java.lang.String username, java.util.List<LeaderCard> leaderCards)
      Submit the leader cards choice to the right player controller and move the turn to next player.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user who chose the cards
      leaderCards - the cards chosen by the user

    • addPlayer

      public PlayerController addPlayer​(java.lang.String username, ClientHandler clientHandler, boolean notify)
      Adds the player to the match and creates the instance of the relative player controller. An associated virtual view is also connected to the clientHandler. Add this object as observer of the new Player Controller
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player to add
      clientHandler - the clientHandler that manage the socket connection with the client
      Returns:
      the player controller containing the reference to the virtual view
